channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon rivals Apple and Spotify by giving away free music streaming for 3 months
item.description: Amazon Music Unlimited is now free for three months and also includes Audible ahead of the retailer's Spring Deal Days sale

item.title: Poundland shoppers say 99p room spray 'smells like' £100 Gucci perfume
item.description: Lots of shoppers were thrilled to find the affordable room spray could have your house "smelling of Gucci" on a budget

item.title: Car tax changes introduced in days - drives could be forced to pay £2,745 more
item.description: A major Vehicle Excise Duty (VED) overhaul is set to see car owners across the board hit with new rates from April 1 - and this includes electric vehi...

item.title: Donald Trump's thirst for revenge in Prince Harry visa row as 'nightmare' isn't over
item.description: Documents relating to Harry's US visa have been released in a long-running legal battle - but most of the files were redacted and did not reveal any d...

item.title: Woman fed up of entitled neighbours parking on her driveway takes matters into own hands
item.description: A woman has been left furious after her neighbours continued to use her driveway as a parking space, despite telling them multiple times they weren't ...

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
item.description: 'I saw a ship or something in trouble.'

item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.

item.title: Chicken lays anus clenchingly massive egg
